mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UNIZ (unizSN, unizTypeSN, unizKeyword, enable) VALUES (UNIZ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{unizTypeSn} ,#{unizKeyword} , #{enable})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM uniz WHERE unizTypeSn=#{unizTypeSn} AND unizKeyword=#{unizKeyword}
mapper.update: UPDATE UNIZ SET unizkeyword= #{unizKeyword}, enable=#{enable}, updateDatetime=sysdate WHERE unizsn = #{unizSn}
mapper.select: select u1.unizsn , u1.parentunizsn ,u2.unizkeyword parentunizkeyword, u3.unizkeyword childunizkeyword from unizLayerlist u1, uniz u2, uniz u3 where u1.parentunizsn = u2.unizsn and u1.unizsn = u3.unizsn
select count(*) from unizlayerlist where unizsn = #{unizSn} and parentunizsn = #{parentUnizSn}
mapper.update: UPDATE UNIZLAYERLIST SET unizSn = #{unizSn}, parentUnizSn = #{parentUnizSn} where unizSn = #{unizSn} and parentUnizSn = #{parentUnizSn}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM UNIZ where unizSn = #{unizSn} and parentUnizSn = #{parentUnizSn}
mapper.select: select unizsn, uniztypesn, unizKeyword, enable from uniz where unizsn not in (select unizsn from unizlayerlist)
